Andy Catch

I'm a self-taught designer with experience in design systems, prototyping, typography, user experience, brand identity & technology. I've worked across Telecommunications, Automotive, Consumer Packaged Goods and Fashion. I’m currently a Design Director at R/GA NY

  • Phase:
  • This phase is a “zoomed out” perspective on my recent work. Given my main client for the past five years has been Verizon, the initial challenge was landing on logical project groupings. Hence why we have "Vision" and "Systems" pages. In the future I’ll be looking to build out more thorough case studies.
  • Acknowledgement:
  • I grew up on Gadigal land. I acknowledge the traditional owners, and pay my respects to Elders past and present. Always was, always will be Aboriginal land. I currently live and work on the land of the Lenape Nation, and respectfully acknowledge their traditions, language and culture.
